title: AI Integration in Nursing Education: Citizen-Centric Understanding-Based Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of science and nursing concepts, and basic smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Learners have limited experience with AI technology and engage in learning within a smartphone-centric, technology-constrained environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three basic applications of AI in nursing (e.g., diagnostic support, patient monitoring).
Learners can comparatively analyze the positive impacts (e.g., improved efficiency) and limitations (e.g., lack of human care) of AI technology on nursing practice.
Learners can experience the operation of AI nursing tools through smartphone-based simulations and propose utilization scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
